result.execSummary:
All charges against Matthew J Konty in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Matthew J Konty is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Matthew J Konty

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Matthew J Konty in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Matthew J Konty in custody.  Samuel E. Simpson on behalf of Patrick J Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: STW
Case set for Plea/sentencing hearing.  On motion of the State, Court ordered case dismissed.

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court, defendant Matthew J Konty not in court, in custody.  Patrick J Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: STW  
Case set for Bail/bond hearing.  Defense request an adjournment as the defendant was not produced for todays hearing. Case adjourned, Branch 38.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Received & Filed, PRELIMINARY HEARING of Original Transcript (18 pages) commencing 03-10-2022 by IRENE KOENIGS.

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court, defendant Matthew J Konty not in court, in custody.  Jessica Bellows appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: STW  
Case set for Bail/bond hearing.  Defense request an adjournment for reasons presented to the Court. Case adjournedm, Branch 38.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for April 5, 2022 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Matthew J Konty in court with Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent; both appear by video.  Defendant Matthew J Konty in custody.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: Village of West Milwaukee Officer L. Roth.  State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty. Defense to be heard on bail on the next date.  Case is adjourned to Branch 38.  Bail bond hearing scheduled for March 14, 2022 at 08:15 am.

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court by telephone, defendant Matthew J Konty not in court, in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. Attorney Sargent has intake and is unable to appear. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 10, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no contact with All KFCs in Milwaukee County.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.

Defendant Matthew J Konty in court with attorney Travis Schwantes.  Defendant Matthew J Konty in custody.  Mark O Thomson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Wagner, Branch 38.
Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch 38.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
